org.quackbot.hooks

Interface HookLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaHookLoader, JSHookLoader

    public interface HookLoader
    Generic hook loading interface. Allows hooks to be written in other languages and loaded at runtime.
    Author:
    Leon Blakey

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hook load(String fileLocation)
      Given the location of a file, load it as a Hook or as a Command.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        Hook load(String fileLocation)
          throws Exception
        Given the location of a file, load it as a Hook or as a Command. Note that Command is a much more specialized class and needs to be treated as such.

        This is only called for files that match the extension given to Controller

        Parameters:
        fileLocation - The location of the file.
        Throws:
        Exception - Any exception encountered while parsing. The hook will not be added and the exception will be logged
